meanings.sent1: She preordered the new book before it was released.
meanings.sent2: I always preorder my favorite video games to make sure I get them on time.
meanings.sent3: The eager fan preordered the concert tickets as soon as they were available.
meanings.sent4: He preordered his lunch for the meeting to avoid any delays.
meanings.sent5: Preordering the limited edition item secured her a special gift.

meanings.sent1: They preordered the seating plan for the event to avoid any confusion.
meanings.sent2: The team preordered their strategy for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: She preordered her outfits for the week to save time in the mornings.
meanings.sent4: The teacher preordered the classroom setup for the new semester.
meanings.sent5: Preordering the tasks helped them stay ahead of schedule.
